item.title: My First Post
item.description: H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alt-H1 Alt-H2 var s = "JavaScript syntax highlighting"; alert(s); s = "Python syntax highlighting" print s No language indicated, so no syntax highlighting. But let's throw in a <b>tag</b>. Inline code has back-ticks around it. Colons can be used to align columns. Tables Are Cool col 3 is right-aligned $1600 col 2 is centered $12 zebra stripes are neat $1 There must be at least 3 dashes separating each header cell.
